verses.verse: Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about when all <S%H3605><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> and in the lowland <S%H8219><s%> and on all <S%H3605><s%> the coast <S%H2348><s%> of the Great <S%H1419><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> <S%H4136><s%> Lebanon, <S%H3844><s%> the Hittite <S%H2850><s%> and the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> the Perizzite, <S%H6522><s%> the Hivite <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusite, <S%H2983><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> of it,
that they gathered <S%H6908><s%> themselves together <S%H9191><s%> with one <S%H259><s%> accord <S%H6310><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> with Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and with Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
When the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> what <S%H834><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> to Jericho <S%H3405><s%> and to Ai, <S%H5857><s%>

they also <S%H1571><s%> acted <S%H6213><s%> craftily <S%H6195><s%> and set <S%H1980><s%> out as envoys, <S%H6737><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> worn-out sacks <S%H8242><s%> on their donkeys, <S%H2543><s%> and wineskins, <S%H4997><s%> worn-out and torn <S%H1234><s%> and mended, <S%H9503><s%>

and worn-out and patched <S%H2921><s%> sandals <S%H5275><s%> on their feet, <S%H7272><s%> and worn-out clothes <S%H8008><s%> on themselves; and all <S%H3605><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of their provision <S%H9479><s%> was dry <S%H3001><s%> [and] had become <S%H1961><s%> crumbled. <S%H5350><s%>

And they went <S%H1980><s%> to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> to the camp <S%H4264><s%> at Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him and to the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "We have come <S%H935><s%> from a far <S%H7350><s%> country; <S%H776><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with us."

And the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the Hivites, <S%H2340><s%> "Perhaps <S%H194><s%> you are living <S%H3427><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> our land; <S%H7130><s%> how <S%H349><s%> then shall we make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you?"

But they said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> "We are your servants. <S%H5650><s%>" Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Who <S%H4310><s%> are you, and where <S%H370><s%> do you come <S%H935><s%> from?"

And they said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Your servants <S%H5650><s%> have come <S%H935><s%> from a very <S%H3966><s%> far <S%H7350><s%> country <S%H776><s%> because of the fame <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> for we have heard <S%H8085><s%> the report <S%H8089><s%> of Him and all <S%H3605><s%> that He did <S%H6213><s%> in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%>

and all <S%H3605><s%> that He did <S%H6213><s%> to the two <S%H8147><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> to Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> and to Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%> who <S%H834><s%> was at Ashtaroth. <S%H6252><s%>

"So our elders <S%H2205><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of our country <S%H776><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to us, saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Take <S%H3947><s%> provisions <S%H6720><s%> in your hand <S%H3027><s%> for the journey, <S%H1870><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> to meet <S%H7122><s%> them and say <S%H559><s%> to them, "We are your servants; <S%H5650><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> then, make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with us."'

"This <S%H2088><s%> our bread <S%H3899><s%> [was] warm <S%H2525><s%> [when] we took <S%H9480><s%> it for our provisions <S%H9480><s%> out of our houses <S%H1004><s%> on the day <S%H3117><s%> that we left <S%H3318><s%> to come <S%H1980><s%> to you; but now <S%H6258><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> it is dry <S%H3001><s%> and has become <S%H1961><s%> crumbled. <S%H5350><s%>

"And these <S%H428><s%> wineskins <S%H4997><s%> which <S%H834><s%> we filled <S%H4390><s%> were new, <S%H2319><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> they are torn; <S%H1234><s%> and these <S%H428><s%> our clothes <S%H8008><s%> and our sandals <S%H5275><s%> are worn <S%H1086><s%> out because <S%H4480><s%> of the very <S%H3966><s%> long <S%H7231><s%> journey. <S%H1870><s%>"
So the men <S%H376><s%> [of Israel] took <S%H3947><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> of their provisions, <S%H9479><s%> and did not ask <S%H7592><s%> for the counsel <S%H6310><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> with them and made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them, to let them live; <S%H2421><s%> and the leaders <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> [an oath] to them.

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about at the end <S%H7097><s%> of three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> after <S%H310><s%> they had made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them, that they heard <S%H8085><s%> that they were neighbors <S%H7138><s%> and that they were living <S%H3427><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> their land. <S%H7130><s%>

Then the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> set <S%H5265><s%> out and came <S%H935><s%> to their cities <S%H5892><s%> on the third <S%H7992><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%> Now their cities <S%H5892><s%> [were] Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> and Chephirah <S%H3716><s%> and Beeroth <S%H881><s%> and Kiriath-jearim.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did not strike <S%H5221><s%> them because <S%H3588><s%> the leaders <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> had sworn <S%H7650><s%> to them by the Lord <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> And the whole <S%H3605><s%> congregation <S%H5712><s%> grumbled <S%H9235><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the leaders. <S%H5387><s%>

But all <S%H3605><s%> the leaders <S%H5387><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the whole <S%H3605><s%> congregation, <S%H5712><s%> "We have sworn <S%H7650><s%> to them by the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and now <S%H6258><s%> we cannot <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3808><s%> touch <S%H5060><s%> them.

"This <S%H2088><s%> we will do <S%H6213><s%> to them, even let them live, <S%H2421><s%> lest <S%H3808><s%> wrath <S%H7110><s%> be upon us for the oath <S%H7621><s%> which <S%H834><s%> we swore <S%H7650><s%> to them."

And the leaders <S%H5387><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Let them live. <S%H2421><s%>" So they became <S%H1961><s%> hewers <S%H2404><s%> of wood <S%H2404><s%> and drawers <S%H7579><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> for the whole <S%H3605><s%> congregation, <S%H5712><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the leaders <S%H5387><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> to them.

Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for them and spoke <S%H1696><s%> to them, saying, <S%H559><s%> "Why <S%H4100><s%> have you deceived <S%H7411><s%> us, saying, <S%H559><s%> 'We are very <S%H3966><s%> far <S%H7350><s%> from you,' when you are living <S%H3427><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> our land <S%H7130><s%>?

"Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, you are cursed, <S%H779><s%> and you shall never <S%H3808><s%> cease <S%H3772><s%> being slaves, <S%H5650><s%> both hewers <S%H2404><s%> of wood <S%H2404><s%> and drawers <S%H7579><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of my God. <S%H430><s%>"

So they answered <S%H6030><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Because <S%H3588><s%> it was certainly <S%H5046><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> your servants <S%H5650><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> His servant <S%H5650><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> you all <S%H3605><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> and to destroy <S%H8045><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you; therefore we feared <S%H3372><s%> greatly <S%H3966><s%> for our lives <S%H5315><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of you, and have done <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing. <S%H1697><s%>

"And now <S%H6258><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> we are in your hands; <S%H3027><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> as it seems good <S%H2896><s%> and right <S%H3477><s%> in your sight <S%H5869><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> to us."

Thus <S%H3651><s%> he did <S%H6213><s%> to them, and delivered <S%H5337><s%> them from the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and they did not kill <S%H2026><s%> them.

But Joshua <S%H3091><s%> made <S%H5414><s%> them that day <S%H3117><s%> hewers <S%H2404><s%> of wood <S%H2404><s%> and drawers <S%H7579><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> for the congregation <S%H5712><s%> and for the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He would choose. <S%H977><s%>
